title: Software Engineering Tools Survey 2024
description: Feedback from software developers about their development tools and workflows
responses: The IDE crashes frequently when working with large files
Documentation could be more comprehensive and include more examples
Great collaboration features make remote work much easier
Performance issues when running multiple services simultaneously
The debugging tools are excellent and save a lot of time
Lack of proper testing framework integration
Would love to see better mobile support
The user interface is intuitive and easy to navigate
Integration with cloud services needs improvement
Learning curve is steep for beginners
Automated deployment features are very helpful
Need better error messages and debugging information
The community support is fantastic and very responsive
License costs are too high for small teams
Version control integration works seamlessly
Would like to see AI-assisted code completion features
The plugin ecosystem is rich but can be overwhelming
Build times are too slow for large projects
Real-time collaboration features need improvement
Security features are robust and well-implemented
The IDE is very resource-intensive and slows down my computer
Need better support for microservices architecture
Code refactoring tools are powerful and time-saving
Wish there was better offline functionality
The search functionality could be more intelligent
